entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 40 percent chance of showers late this morning. Rain beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
